on reading compounds: 和【ワ】sum, harmony, peace, Japan, Japanese-style
和歌【ワカ】waka, classic Japanese poem, esp. a tanka, often 31 morae
kun reading compounds: 大和【やまと】Yamato, ancient province corresponding to modern-day Nara Prefecture, (ancient) Japan, Japanese
大和歌【やまとうた】Japanese poem, waka, tanka
大倭【おおやまと】Japan, Yamato, ancient province corresponding to modern-day Nara Prefecture
